lead_paragraph: Mr. Staier’s concert at the Frick Collection included Froberger’s “Plainte Faite à Londres Pour Passer la Mélancolie” and two memorials.

headline.print_headline: First Gloom, Then Doom, Then a Man Drunkenly Falls Down a Staircase
headline.main: Review: Andreas Staier on the Harpsichord, Coaxing Gravity and Gloom

snippet: Mr. Staier’s concert at the Frick Collection included Froberger’s “Plainte Faite à Londres Pour Passer la Mélancolie” and two memorials.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews harpsichord recital by Andreas Staier at Frick Collection.
